text: @konservativer_teddy: "Energy crisis in Europe? Who has the priciest electricity and gas? 🤔 After Russia's invasion of Ukraine, prices soared, but they're now decreasing. 💰 But let's take a closer look... 🧐 Which countries have the highest and lowest prices in Europe? 🤷‍♂️ And how much have electricity and natural gas prices increased since February 2022? 📈
